name: OR_LNLG_EQUIP_RAD_INFO
description: This table contains documentation of equipment radiation information.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EQUIP_RAD_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document radiation-related information for equipment.
